    Method
    Description
    private void
    activateCharacterCardButton(String methodName)
    If the game mode is expert, there is a button that allows the player to play a character card, the button has to be activated Is also saved last method, because the user can watch available character cards and then decide not to play a card: in case mentioned above, this method is re-called
    void
    askAssistantCard()
    Asks the player to play one of his assistant card.

    Asks the player to insert the parameters of the character card he wants in order to build the effect.

    This method asks player to choose a cloud tile.

    Asks the player to choose the number of players and the game mode.
    void
    askPlayAgain()
    When a game has a regular end (because someone wins, and not because someone was disconnected) This method asks player if he wants to play again, using an interactive alert

    backButton(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
    If activeStage is the stage that shows character cards, this method starts listen on a button to permit the user to come back, if he doesn't want to play any character card

    void
    logout(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
    When a user click on X (top-right), this method asks him if he really wants to quit If he says "yes" we disconnect him
    private void
    playCharacterCard(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
    This method keeps listening on the button for play a character card When this button is clicked, stage that shows available character cards is opened
    private <T> void
    prepareController(String path, T parameters)
    This method loads the correct fxml file (in javafx thread) Here is made the controller setup, adding observer, username, and calling setupScene Every controller has overridden of method setupScene, that dynamically prepares the graphic activeLoader changes dynamically, basing on server requests and following the game flow
    void

    Shows to the players that a very important error occurs during the match.

    void
    showChangePhase(GameState gameState)
    During the transition between setup phase and planning phase, main scene is instantiated, because client model contains all the information to draw the model's objects
    void
    showDisconnectionMessage()
    Shows to the player that another player has disconnected and so the game is ended.

    • prepareController

      private <T> void prepareController(String path, T parameters)
      This method loads the correct fxml file (in javafx thread) Here is made the controller setup, adding observer, username, and calling setupScene Every controller has overridden of method setupScene, that dynamically prepares the graphic activeLoader changes dynamically, basing on server requests and following the game flow
      Type Parameters:
      T - a generic parameter
      Parameters:
      path - the path of fxml file to load
      parameters - a generic parameter, that in some cases is necessary for the controller

    • activateCharacterCardButton

      private void activateCharacterCardButton(String methodName)
      If the game mode is expert, there is a button that allows the player to play a character card, the button has to be activated Is also saved last method, because the user can watch available character cards and then decide not to play a card: in case mentioned above, this method is re-called
      Parameters:
      methodName - the name of method to call

    • initializeMainStage

      private void initializeMainStage()
      This method preparers everything of main stage, which is a window with fixed dimensions.

    • playCharacterCard

      private void playCharacterCard(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
      This method keeps listening on the button for play a character card When this button is clicked, stage that shows available character cards is opened
      Parameters:
      button - play character card button

    • backButton

      private void backButton(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
      If activeStage is the stage that shows character cards, this method starts listen on a button to permit the user to come back, if he doesn't want to play any character card
      Parameters:
      button - the button for come back

    • askPlayAgain

      public void askPlayAgain()
      When a game has a regular end (because someone wins, and not because someone was disconnected) This method asks player if he wants to play again, using an interactive alert
      Specified by:
      askPlayAgain in interface ClientView

    • logout

      public void logout(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
      When a user click on X (top-right), this method asks him if he really wants to quit If he says "yes" we disconnect him
      Parameters:
      stage - the stage to close
